did.abstract: Consists of correspondence, minutes, convention proceedings, and union publications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Papers include personal correspondence, 1896-1957; minutes of Local Assembly 300 (window glass trades), Knights of Labor, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania; unpublished history, by Slight of National Window Glass Workers Association of America; correspondence, minutes, ballots, tally sheets, 1901-1924; legal and financial papers, 1889-1921; Minutes of the Allied Building Trades (council) of Rochester, NY, 1932-1954; wage scales and working rules, convention proceedings, pamphlets, periodicals clippings, and membership cards, chiefly of National Window Glass Workers.
